name: deafenafk
author: cote
short: Auto-move self-deafened users to AFK, then move them back when they undeafen.
description: Moves users to a configured AFK VC when they self-deafen. When they undeafen, moves them back to the VC they were in before the move.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores per-user temporary voice channel IDs in memory to return users to their original voice channel. No persistent personal data is stored.
